news.title: BBC on French beach as police slash migrant 'taxi-boat' heading to UK
news.summary: Watch video of French police destroying a boat in the English Channel in a rare and unusual intervention, which police have made clear is not a new tactic.

news.title: Former Arsenal footballer Thomas Partey charged with rape
news.summary: The ex-Arsenal player is charged with five counts of rape relating to two women, and one count of sexual assault over a third woman.
